attributes.action: immediately reduce the pay of members of parliament and government ministers by 70% because the Lisbon Treaty takes away a total of 70% of political responsibility and authority to the European Commission.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is absolutely no justification for MPs and Ministers to continue to receive 100% of the pay (plus their obscene allowances) when they are now only doing 30% of the work which was done by their predecessors.  MPs and Ministers are employees and employees who do less work get paid less money.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
